parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be officially sanctioned campaign material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "#EchipaValeriuIftime!", clearly referring to a specific group or candidate.  This strongly suggests that "Article 36 (7) - a" applies, as it directly refers to a specific political entity involved in the election.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The use of hashtags further amplifies its public reach. Therefore, it addresses the wide population, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The phrase "Votăm schimbarea!" ("We vote for change!") coupled with the explicit mention of "#EchipaValeriuIftime!" strongly indicates an electoral objective. The clear call to action ("Pe 1 decembrie, votăm...") aims to influence voters to support this specific team. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It doesn't present news, analysis, or opinions; instead, it directly promotes a specific candidate or group. It does not adhere to journalistic standards of objectivity and neutrality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct endorsement of a specific political entity, aiming to influence voting behavior.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>420683510976832</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a specific candidate ("#EchipaValeriuIftime!"), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has a clear electoral objective (influencing voters to support the mentioned team).  The absence of a CMF number is not sufficient to negate these factors.  The post's call to action ("Pe 1 decembrie, votăm...") directly encourages voting for a specific entity.  The content is not journalistic in nature; it's purely promotional.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Echipa Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Nenițică Andrei, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 420683510976832, care promovează explicit "#EchipaValeriuIftime!" și îndeamnă la vot cu fraza "Pe 1 decembrie, votăm #EchipaValeriuIftime! Votăm schimbarea!", având un efect electoral clar de influențare a votului în favoarea echipei menționate, constituind astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.  Reclama, lipsită de elemente jurnalistice, se adresează publicului larg prin intermediul unei platforme publice, Facebook, și are ca obiectiv principal influențarea votului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
